mapper.select: SELECT T.ID, T.BIZNO, T.INSTID, T.APPLYUSERID, (SELECT EMP.EMPNAME FROM JBOS_EMP EMP WHERE EMP.BADGE=T.APPLYUSERID) AS APPLYUSERNAME, T.APPLYDEPID, (SELECT DEP.DEPNAME FROM JBOS_DEP DEP WHERE DEP.ID=T.APPLYDEPID) AS APPLYDEPNAME, T.FEETYPE, T.APPLYTIME, T.TOTALAMT, T.BIZSTATE FROM IM_MATERIAL_OUTSTORE T WHERE T.ID=#{id}
